summary: Build an ultra-cute, cozy, pastel-themed 'Propose Day' landing page with floating hearts, playful evasive 'No' button behavior, and a celebratory confetti + heart-card reveal on 'Yes'—with only the buttons shown (remove the central question text).
architectural_notes: Use JavaScript to randomly reposition the 'No' button on hover/touch to prevent clicks.
Trigger a confetti animation and reveal a heart-shaped card UI upon clicking the 'Yes' button.

existing_features.title: Create a single-screen 'Propose Day' landing page with an ultra-cute, cozy pastel theme (pinks, soft yellows, creams) and centered main content.
Add an ambient floating-hearts background animation behind the main content.
Display the exact central proposal text: "Chalo ajj 1 date decide kar hi lete hai, yeh trial period ab Khatam karte hai toh bolo phir will you be my laado officially?"
Implement two call-to-action buttons under the central text: a smaller 'No' button and a larger, pink, glowing 'Yessss miss madam baby ji' button.
Make the 'No' button evade interaction: on hover (mouse) or touch/pointer attempt (mobile), reposition it to a random on-screen location so it is difficult to click.

When the user clicks the 'Yessss miss madam baby ji' button, trigger a confetti explosion and reveal a prominent heart-shaped card containing the exact message: "CONGRATULATIONS you are officially my laado now!!! I LOVE YOUUU❤️"

Remove the central proposal/question headline text from the landing screen so that, before acceptance, the UI shows only the two existing call-to-action buttons (the evasive "No" button and the glowing "Yessss miss madam baby ji" button) over the existing floating-hearts background.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create 'Propose Day' pastel landing page with central proposal text, floating hearts, evasive 'No' button, and 'Yes' button triggering confetti + heart-shaped congratulations card
Remove the central proposal/question text and display only the two CTA buttons
